attribution: Designed by 2018 North American Champion Sam Suied
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card. You may score that card, if able. Remove this operation from the game.
text:
After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.
Place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card. You may score that card, if able.
Remove this operation from the game.
title: Big Deal
